1.SceneDescription:
Monica and Rachel's erm, Chandler and Joey's, Chandler, Monica, and Phoebe are
there. Phoebe is stressing out about something.

lines.Line:
I-I can’t find anything that I want to eat! Everything I eat makes
me nauseous! I’m telling you, being pregnant is no piece of cake—ooh! Cake!
(Chandler shrugs, and Phoebe grimaces.) No

God! Ooh! What is that smell? It’s coming from the bathroom. Ooh!
(She goes to the bathroom.
Wow! Pregnancy does give you some weird cravings

lines.Character: [Cut to the bathroom, Joey is taking a shower and Phoebe knocks on the door
lines.Line: Cut to the bathroom, Joey is taking a shower and Phoebe knocks on the door.

lines.Character: [Cut to the bathroom, Joey is taking a shower and Phoebe knocks on the door
lines.Line: Cut to the bathroom, Joey is taking a shower and Phoebe knocks on the door.

It’s me. It’s Phoebe. Listen there’s something in here I
want to eat, what-what smells so good

lines.Character: (Joey sticks his head out of the shower curtain
lines.Line: Joey sticks his head out of the shower curtain.
Is it the shampoo? It’s guava
Is it the shampoo? It’s guava
Oh! Wait-wait! (Reaches inside the shower.) Is it my bologna sandwich

Yes. Yes. Yes. I can’t believe it! The baby wants bologna! Maybe he
wants me to eat meat? I can’t eat meat
Oh, wait-wait! (Reaches into the shower again.) Maybe it’s a pickle?

2.SceneDescription: Bloomingdale’s, Rachel is preparing to slip Joshua the note.

lines.Line: (coming in from a changing room) Okay
Oh, here’s that trench-coat that you wanted
Oh great! (He tries on the coat.) Wow! Yeah, it’s comfortable.

Man, I could really flash somebody in this thing. (He goes to put his
hands in his pockets.

(stopping him) Oh no-no, no-no, they don’t want you to put your
hands in the pockets until you are out of the store

Well, that’s because of a lot of…(She imitates someone picking
their nose and placing the treasure found in the pockets.
Y’know, they ruin it for everybody
Y’know, they ruin it for everybody
Y’know, I wore that cashmere sweater on a date last night
Yeah, it was my first date since the uh, since the divorce
Well, congratulations, so do you love her

No, no, no, she’s nice but, y’know, it just it made me realize
that I’m just not, I’m just not ready to be dating, y’know

Huh. Well, uh, that’s uh, that’s interesting. (She goes over
and retrieves her note.
Oh, it’s just an anti-theft device
Oh, it’s just an anti-theft device

Then uh, what’s-what’s this? (Shows her the real anti-theft
device.

You need that, you need that too ‘cause obviously, a thief could
just tear this up. (Rips up the note.

3.SceneDescription:
Monica and Rachel's erm, Chandler and Joey's, it is later in the party. The
Spin the Bottle game is over and Chandler is making a sandwich as Phoebe watches.

lines.Line:
Y’know it doesn’t matter how much I’m craving it.
Y’know why I’m never gonna eat meat? Because it’s murder, cold blooded
murder

lines.Character:
(He takes a bite out of the sandwich and as he does so, Phoebe attacks the other end
and starts devouring the sandwich
lines.Line:
He takes a bite out of the sandwich and as he does so, Phoebe attacks the other end
and starts devouring the sandwich.

There’s a Phoebe on my sandwich! (He walks away, giving the
sandwich to Phoebe.
I can’t help it. I need the meat. The baby needs the meat

All right look, y’know how-y’know how when you’re dating
someone and you don’t want to cheat on them, unless it’s with someone really
hot

All right. Okay. Well this is the same kind of deal. If you’re going
to do something wrong, (He grabs two steaks from the freezer) do it right

lines.Character: [Cut to later, Phoebe is finishing off her steak
lines.Line: Cut to later, Phoebe is finishing off her steak.

lines.Character: [Cut to later, Phoebe is finishing off her steak
lines.Line: Cut to later, Phoebe is finishing off her steak.

Yeah, but at what cost? Six more months, three meals a day, I’m
gonna eat like, y’know millions of cows
Hey, what if I said, I could even things out for ya, meatwise
Well, I eat a lot of meat right

Well, suppose until the baby’s born I laid off it. No extra animals
would die, you-you’d just be eating my animals
Joey, I can’t believe you would do that for me
Absolutely! I could be a vegetarian. There’s no meat in beer, right

lines.Character: [Cut to Ross and Emily standing by the foosball table
lines.Line: Cut to Ross and Emily standing by the foosball table.

lines.Character: [Cut to Ross and Emily standing by the foosball table
lines.Line: Cut to Ross and Emily standing by the foosball table.

Okay, we could still make dinner if we skipped the appetisers and asked
for our check right away

lines.Character:
(Rachel enters, she has changed once again. This time into her high school cheerleading
uniform
lines.Line:
Rachel enters, she has changed once again. This time into her high school cheerleading
uniform.

But, we can’t go now. It looks like Rachel’s gonna put on a
skit

But, we can’t go now. It looks like Rachel’s gonna put on a
skit
Oh my God! Have you lost your mind

No-n-n-n-no! I am finally thinking clearly. My lucky dress
wasn’t working out to well for me, but for four years, this baby never missed

Rachel-Rachel-Rachel I-I cannot, I can’t let—(pause), actually
I kinda want to see what happens

Ohh, yeah, well I wanted to give Emily a big American good-bye
cheer. So okay! (Runs into the living room) Ready! Okay! Gimme an ‘E!

What do you get? (She throws her pom-poms to Joey and Phoebe and
performs a cartwheel.) Emily!! (Tries to do another one.) Emil—Whoa!! (She falls in
Chandler’s room.) Okay! So that’s me as a cheerleader! Ta-dum! (Gunther’s
the only one that claps.

lines.Character: (Joey and Monica rush over to her
lines.Line: Joey and Monica rush over to her.

lines.Character: (Joey and Monica rush over to her
lines.Line: Joey and Monica rush over to her.

I’m fine! I’m fine! I’m just losing a tooth, it’s no
big deal. I have a dentist! Y’know. I’m gonna go put some ice on it. Excuse me.
(She goes over to the ice and Joey and Monica follow her.) What do I do now? What do I do
now
Okay, time to take off the bra. (She glares at him.
Umm, that was really great, but I-I gotta take-off actually
(trying not to be obvious) Take the bra off
(trying not to be obvious) Take the bra off
All right, come on, let’s go get your coat

lines.Character: (They both go to Chandler’s bedroom to get his coat
lines.Line: They both go to Chandler’s bedroom to get his coat.
So, this was uh, really fun

Oh, yeah! Real fun. (She makes a decision.) Y’know, this bra…
Really, bothers me. (She starts taking off her bra.) Y’know, this used to be my
bedroom. Yeah. A lot of memories in here, a lot of memories. If these walls could
talk, y’know what they’d say? Wanna hear some memories? (She is now violently
pulling on her bra in order to remove it, but it isn’t co-operating.
Need uh, need a little hand there
Need uh, need a little hand there
Oh no-no-no! No, I got this all under control
You really don’t seem like you do. That’s
You really don’t seem like you do. That’s

lines.Character:
(She is still yanking on the bra, but it is stuck in her sleeve. Finally, she gives
up
lines.Line:
She is still yanking on the bra, but it is stuck in her sleeve. Finally, she gives
up.

Ughhhh!! Forget it! (Sits down heavily on the bed.) This is, this is not
how this is supposed to happen
Well, what was supposed to happen
Well, what was supposed to happen

Can you not look at me when I say this? (He turns around) I thought that
if I could get you here, I could seduce you

Huh. Oh, boy! (Sits down next to her.) Uhh, I-I don’t wear suits to
work, and I bought six of them from you
Well, I’m sorry, I thought you needed them
Well, I’m sorry, I thought you needed them

No, no-no, no-no, my point is that I kept coming back because, I wanted
to see you

Yeah! I mean you’re-you’re beautiful and smart and
sophisticated—a lot of this isn’t based on tonight

Yeah but-but-but you liked me! Oh my God, I can’t believe this, all
this time, I liked you and you liked me

Oh no-no-no don’t say but! No-no, but’s never good! Let’s
just leave it at, you like me and I like you
Oh, now see that’s a fancy but

My marriage like just ended, and I’m really not ready to get
into anything yet
I’m sorry, I, I just need a little time

4.SceneDescription:
Monica and Rachel's erm, Chandler and Joey's, the next day. Phoebe is busy
making a sandwich.

lines.Line: Oh-ho-ho, yeah! Hey! Y’know what goes good with that

Ooh, I was gonna say bologna, but that’s much better. How about a
little of that smoked turkey

(He starts looking longingly at the sandwich.) Oh mama! Uh when-when is
the baby due

Ugh. Now if a cow should die of natural causes, I can have one of those
right
Not if I get there first
Not if I get there first
